name: Turkey Burger
preparation: Whisk first 5 ingredients together in a large mixing bowl.
Mix in turkey and gluten-free breadcrumbs. Season with Salt and Pepper.

Lightly oil, and preheat grill to medium heat. Cook for 5 minutes lid closed, flip, and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until instant read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 175° F (80° C).
Serve bun-less, or on gluten-free buns with shredded lettuce, tomatoes and a dollop of prepared Guacamole.
tips: Ensure an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 165° F (74° C) for ground chicken or turkey. Hold the cooked patty with a pair of tongs. Insert the thermometer sideways and wait 30 seconds before reading.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavour with medium heat.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!
